subject: Re: Can't seem to capture any evp's........suggestions would be apprectiated....
author: purplespacefriend
full_text:
Well, few want to hear it, but there is absolutely no need to go to 
so called haunted locations. I suggest you try working at home, 
patiently, and with a verity of methods. Usually you need somekind of 
background sound that "they" can use to form voices, in the past that 
was white noise, and that will still work, but now various swept 
radios are being used for louder, and clearer messages. 

 I have tried for years to get people out of that crazy ghost hunter 
mentality--to no avail! 

 Frank-S
